metas.name: Fargo
metas.description: Dark comedy with crime elements, similar to Brassic and some of the user's dramas.

metas.name: Sherlock
metas.description: Mystery, crime, and drama with a clever protagonist, aligning with All Her Fault and The Night Manager.

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: Dystopian sci-fi with dark humor and social commentary, appealing to fans of Love, Death & Robots and Rick and Morty.

metas.name: The Good Place
metas.description: Philosophical comedy with heartwarming elements, similar to Ted Lasso but with a fantastical twist.

metas.name: Peep Show
metas.description: British comedy with awkward and relatable humor, similar to Goodness Gracious Me and It's Always Sunny.

metas.name: Arrested Development
metas.description: Cult comedy with a dysfunctional family and absurd humor, appealing to fans of The Simpsons and It's Always Sunny.

metas.name: The Boys
metas.description: Superhero satire with dark humor and violence, similar to One-Punch Man but with a more cynical tone.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: German sci-fi mystery with time travel and complex characters, appealing to fans of Stranger Things and Foundation.

metas.name: Severance
metas.description: Dystopian sci-fi thriller with a unique premise and compelling characters, similar to Black Mirror and Foundation.

metas.name: What We Do in the Shadows
metas.description: Mockumentary comedy about vampires, with absurd humor and strong ensemble cast, similar to It's Always Sunny.

metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: Optimistic workplace comedy with a heartwarming ensemble cast, similar to Ted Lasso and Scrubs.

metas.name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
metas.description: Police procedural comedy with a strong ensemble cast and lighthearted humor, similar to Scrubs and Parks and Rec.

metas.name: Maniac
metas.description: Mind-bending sci-fi drama with dark humor and strong performances, similar to Love, Death & Robots and Black Mirror.

metas.name: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
metas.description: Sci-fi comedy mystery with quirky characters and absurd plot twists, similar to Doctor Who and Rick and Morty.

metas.name: Upload
metas.description: Sci-fi comedy with a romantic twist, exploring the afterlife in a digital world, similar to Futurama and The Good Place.

metas.name: Russian Doll
metas.description: Dark comedy with a time loop premise and existential themes, similar to Black Mirror and Rick and Morty.

metas.name: Atlanta
metas.description: Comedy-drama with surreal and thought-provoking elements, exploring themes of race and identity, similar to Brassic but more introspective.

metas.name: Bojack Horseman
metas.description: Animated comedy-drama with dark humor and complex characters, exploring themes of depression and addiction, similar to Rick and Morty.

metas.name: After Life
metas.description: Dark comedy-drama about grief and loss, with a cynical but ultimately heartwarming tone, similar to Ted Lasso but more melancholic.

metas.name: The Umbrella Academy
metas.description: Superhero series with a dysfunctional family and time travel elements, similar to Stranger Things and Doctor Who.

metas.name: Happy!
metas.description: Dark comedy with over-the-top violence and a quirky premise, appealing to fans of The Boys and One-Punch Man.

metas.name: Counterpart
metas.description: Sci-fi thriller with parallel universes and espionage elements, similar to Foundation and The Night Manager.
